english.segment1: (verse 1). You say that you want to fly. But you mind is weak. and you don't know why. And you, always wanted more. than you ever got. than you had wished for
english.segment2: (pre-chorus). Well if you could see the truth. It's all because of you. Oh, if you could try to open up your mind. Then you would see the light
english.segment3: (chorus). But you want to. Taste it, smell it, Take it, Kill it. Use it till the life is gone. You want to Break it, Rape it. Try to make it into your new pet. But it couldn't hate you more
english.segment4: (verse 2). You say that the war is won. That's been in your head. and it's almost done. Well we'll see, when you get back home. When you're on the floor. and you're all alone
english.segment5: (pre-chorus 2). Well I've finally seen the truth. It's all because of you. Oh, if you could try to open up your mind. Then you would see the light
english.segment8: (bridge). Oh, and I know it hurts, Oh, I can feel your pain. Oh, I just want to love you more, Oh, I just want to love you
